title: The Devil's Dictionary
description: pubOne.info thank you for your continued support and wish to present you this new edition. The Devil's Dictionary was begun in a weekly paper in 1881, and was continued in a desultory way at long intervals until 1906. In that year a large part of it was published in covers with the title The Cynic's Word Book, a name which the author had not the power to reject or happiness to approve. To quote the publishers of the present work:
author: Ambrose Bierce
